segments.text: I think these patterns are quite good . Can you give me a price indication of these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , it's my pleasure . We'll quote you the lowest price prevailing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . If your price is suitable , then we can make further discussion of contract .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is our price list , our terms are cash within three months of date of delivery , if you can pay it within one month . we'll give you a discount of 10 % .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . How many goods do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me how many goods you intend to order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The most we can offer you at present is 600 dozen .
segments.speaker: S2
